title: Why pick an adc............ when you can go ap ezreal bot an pick up a lichbane as your 3/4th item.
body:
Then you do more damage than anyone, the idiot tanky people rush armor instead of mr cause of their derp metabuilds.
Ap itemzation is way better than ad. lichbane ezreal wrecks towers.

rush sheen for good tower taking power aswell.
